body:
I don't understand how this can be an intermittant problem on the trybots.  I haven't been able to trigger it once locally.  The fact that the test ran the full 60 seconds leads me to believe that the signal isn't being delivered.  The original test was sending a SIGINT and we were seeing similar weirdness with the trybots, and that's not even a signal that the Go signal handler listens for. 
I'm not sure what would cause this.
